categories: Category:Stormtroopers of the Empire of the Hand

nodes.text: Puriv was a male Stromma who served the Empire of the Hand as a stormtrooper aboard the Imperial I-class Star Destroyer Admonitor. In 8 ABY, the Stromma council representative Nyama ordered the Stromma to revoke their support of the Empire of the Hand and called for all of the Stromma aboard the Admonitor to leave the ship. To uphold the honor of his family, Puriv heeded Nyama's order and departed from the vessel.
